GSD.description:
selinux: Add boundary check in put_entry()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 7363a69d8ca8f0086f8e1196c8ddaf0e168614b1. For more details please see the references link.
